html:
April 1 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - MASTERCARD INVESTMENT IN MOBILE MONEY BUSINESS

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - SIGNING OF AN AGREEMENT UNDER WHICH MASTERCARD WILL INVEST $100M IN AIRTEL MOBILE COMMERCE BV

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - TRANSACTION VALUES AIRTEL AFRICA'S MOBILE MONEY BUSINESS AT $2.65BN ON A CASH AND DEBT FREE BASIS.

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - MASTERCARD WILL HOLD A MINORITY STAKE IN AMC BV UPON COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - PROCEEDS FROM TRANSACTION WILL BE USED TO REDUCE GROUP DEBT AND INVEST IN NETWORK AND SALES INFRASTRUCTURE

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
